example.eg: Ellen wrapped Olivia's birthday present.
example.egtrans: 艾伦吧送给奥利维亚的生日礼物包装了起来。

example.eg: Peter wrapped his Christmas presents in shiny paper.
example.egtrans: 彼得用闪闪发光的包装纸包裹他准备的圣诞礼物。

example.eg: Alan wrapped the leftovers and put them in the fridge.
example.egtrans: 亚伦把剩菜包起来，放入了冰箱中。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包裹, 裹起, 包起

example.eg: Rachel wrapped some salad in a tortilla for lunch.
example.egtrans: 蕾切尔将沙拉卷在玉米饼里当做午餐。

example.eg: Emily wrapped her baby in a towel and put talc on his feet.
example.egtrans: 艾米丽用毛巾裹着宝宝，在他的脚上抹上爽身粉。

example.eg: Ned ate a falafel wrap for lunch.
example.egtrans: 内德的午餐吃了一种卷起来吃的三明治。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一种卷起来吃的三明治

example.eg: The evening was a little chilly, so Imogen pulled a wrap around her shoulders.
example.egtrans: 夜晚有些寒冷，所以伊莫金在肩膀上披了一块披肩。

example.eg: I'll wrap it up securely and put it in the post to you.

dsense.name: wrap [sth] up, wrap up [sth]
dsense.guideword: (gift-wrap, turn into a parcel) (用美丽的纸张及缎带等)

example.eg: I have to wrap up the birthday presents.
Let's wrap the meeting up - I have a plane to catch.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 圆满结束, 顺利完成

example.eg: Wrap up if you're going outside – you don't want to catch a cold.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 气泡衬垫, 包装气泡膜

example.eg: I need to buy some gift wrap for the Christmas presents.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包装纸, 礼品包装纸

example.eg: It's a present - could you gift-wrap it for me please?
example.egtrans: 这是一份礼物，你能帮我包装一下吗？

dsense.name: gift wrap [sth], gift-wrap [sth], giftwrap [sth]
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (allow or grant a benefit)

example.eg: We gift-wrapped the other team's first victory by playing so badly.

dsense.name: plastic wrap, Saran wrap (US), cling film, clingfilm (UK)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 热缩塑料薄膜, 收缩薄膜

dsense.name: That's a wrap, It's a wrap!

example.eg: The director shouted, "That's a wrap!"

trans_examp.trans_cn: 今天就到这儿！, 收工！

dsense.name: That's a wrap, It's a wrap!

example.eg: "That's a wrap," the boss announced, at the end of the project.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完成, 收工, 完工

example.eg: I wrapped ribbon around it to make it look pretty.

dsense.name: wrap [sb] around your finger, wrap [sb] around your little finger
wrap [sb] up in cotton wool, wrap [sb] in cotton wool
wrap-up, wrapup
dsense.guideword: (relating to the end or final summary)

example.eg: Sarah was wearing a wraparound shawl.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 包着的, 包裹的, 缠绕的

example.eg: There is a large wraparound mural painted on one of the walls of our school.
Our new house has a wraparound deck on two sides.
Kelly always wears a wraparound during the fall to keep warm.
I think I'll need to use wraparound when I add another screen to my setup.
